Name: filtered-list-box
Description: Filtered drop down by the associated objects to the selection in another drop down list

Options.Description: Set the name of the view you want to use data from

Options.DisplayName: Node ID of the data to use as filter
Options.Description: Set the node ID you want to use data from to filter the drop down for the associated object

Options.DisplayName: Node ID of the data to associate
Options.Description: Set the node ID of the data to be used for the associated objects
Set the text that you want to appear in front of the drop down list

Options.DisplayName: Label for the drop down to filter
Options.Description: Set the text that you want to appear in front of the drop down list that is used to filter
